Creating Shortcuts to Items

For easy access to items that you are tracking, you can save shortcuts to them on your desktop. Opening a shortcut starts the application, opens the project view in the configuration it had when the shortcut was created, and displays the Properties dialog for the item.

To save a shortcut to an item:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Select the appropriate component tab. This action also displays the component menu item on the menu bar.

  3. Select an item from the upper pane.

  4. Select Save Shortcut from the component or context menu. The Save As dialog opens.

  5. Enter a name or use the default name for the shortcut in the File Name text box. Keep the .stw extension.

  6. Select a location, usually your desktop, for storing the shortcut.

  7. Click Save.

To open an item with your shortcut:

Do one of the following:

  • Double-click the shortcut from your desktop or Windows Explorer.

  • Select Project > Open Shortcut from the menu bar. The Open dialog displays. Select the shortcut name and click Open.

After you log on, the Properties dialog for the item opens.
